title: Sam Smith of Road & Track
description:
Sam Smith is a writer for Road & Track magazine and an accomplished vintage racer. He's driven some unique cars, including IndyCars from almost every decade, and retired F1 cars. He drove down in his Integra Type-R to talk about it all. 

Read Sam's work: https://www.roadandtrack.com/author/2560/sam-smith/

This show is a video! https://youtu.be/Xcg-c7TAmyk

Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @thatsamsmith
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @thatsamsmith

Check out our merch!
https://www.blipshift.com/collections/the-smoking-tire
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
